title: Am I even getting honor??
body:
Like... I haven't gone up in level and i have gone up 3 divisions. 

I've gotten 3 "Most honorable player" notifications.

It seems as if honor is "paused".

Send help.

replies.body:
Or... Use common sense... and realize that you aren't supposed to go up in honor levels quickly.

It's supposed to take over the course of a year to get Level 5, so what makes you think you're getting level 3 in a couple of weeks?
ty, your nice words have help me
